name: Sanjay Dogra
summary: To work for professional organization that gives an opportunity for growth and to contribute value based management talent along with the seeking guidance from proficient seniors to help me sharpen my skills. To be a part of the team that works in dynamically challenging environment for growth of the organization and helping in achieving goal congruency. Working as a NOC (Network Operation Center) Engineer in Encore Capital Group. That is a leading BPO in call center technology. Having Eight plus years of professional experience, I bring forth a unique set of knowledge and skills which include an in-depth understanding of Business Processes and Structured Methodologies, experience in the Customer Service industry, excellent understanding of Offshore Client requirements, professional education and valuable experience gained mostly while working in last couple of organisation. Highlights Service Now, Microsoft Lync, MSN. *VPN: Cisco client, Cisco SSL, Check point Secure client. *Operating System: XP, Windows 7. *Office Tools: MS Office 2007 & 2010
skills: VPN (Cisco client, Cisco SSL, Check Point Secure Client)
Monitoring tools: Application Manager, NetFlow Analyzer, SolarWinds Orion

experience.title: NOC Engineer
experience.description: NOC responsibilities within Enterprise operations: event and incident management (L2/L3), troubleshooting alerts from monitoring tools, training new hires, alert configuration, monitoring infrastructure with Application Manager, NetFlow Analyzer, and SolarWinds Orion; updating dashboards and inventory; maintaining ServiceNow tickets and SLAs; creating shift rosters; updating process documents and knowledge management for new joiners; configuring alarms and managing network devices.

experience.title: ServiceDesk Engineer Level 1 Analyst
experience.description: Provided first-level support for desktops and laptops (Win XP/Pro/Vista) for US and China customers; progressed to Level 2, coached Level 1 analysts, managed attendance and reports; remote support (RDP, Microsoft Lync, TeamViewer); handling escalations, training new hires, and contributing to knowledge/documentation; experience with VC equipment and Tandberg conferencing.

experience.title: ServiceDesk Engineer and Floor Engineer
experience.description: Member of Global Helpdesk and Del-IT Mailbox team; managed outages and interruptions; troubleshooting VPN connectivity; worked with Win 7/XP Pro; handled LAN ports and coordinated with vendors; supported internal applications and VC room operations; floor activities and documentation.

experience.title: IT Helpdesk
experience.description: Handled online technical queries of international customers; provided online support to China & U.S. users over MSN using TeamViewer; documented incidents and followed processes from ticket opening to closing; managed IT inventory and vendor follow-ups; supported various hardware/software issues and remote access.

experience.title: Sr. CSA / Allocator (Inbound process)
experience.description: Handled inbound Xerox customer queries related to Xerox machines; toner booking; followed up with field engineers; updated Oracle with installation and inventory data; assigned calls to engineers/warehouse and coordinated with vendors; managed reporting and sales call details.

certifications: Diploma (ADCHNP) in Computer Hardware and Networking - JETKING, New Delhi
